channel.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
channel.description:
Saltshaker (blue dragon, social)
Passive : Impressive : you are always right , always .
Day Ability 1 Wind up : A random target gets all salty at you for no reason
Day Ability 2 I dont have to claim : You dont have to claim when on trial . Everyone automatically votes for you to be exed after someone questions if you might be fool , once everyone has been force voted you immeditly reveal your class and write a random insult about there mothers sexual preferences .
Night Ability 1 I dont have to claim to the prince : If in prison with the prince , immediatly claim you dont need to claim , unflatteringly compare the prince to an orangutang and get executed , as you are bd this will ensure the prince loses his exes for rest of game .
Night Ability 2 Silent Psychic Response : Ssshhhh ! dont say anything to the psychic ,
Win Conditions : Make someone get really salty at you for making them lose . ( the game will still say you have lost , but you know your a fun guy right !)
converted to
Salty Convert ( unseen, social)
passive Annoyed : getting converted is really annoying and you are rightly really annoyed because you where the best player on the team before .
Day Ability 1
Day Ability 1 being Converted Sucks : Immediatly reveal the other members of your faction and disconnect from the game
Day Ability 2 I dont have to claim : You dont have to claim when on trial . Everyone automatically votes for you to be exed after someone questions if you might be fool , once everyone has been force voted you immeditly reveal your team members and compalin that being converted is stupid .
Night Abilty 1 Moan : whinge about being converted and complain to your new team mates about how unfair the game is to have been converted when you would of won if you had stuck with the bd .
Win Condition : You cant possibly win , you where too awesome when you where BD and now the BD cant lose .

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Oh wait misread your post. I though you meant that you in particular are always voted D2. Rather than 1 being voted D2. Yes that is a bad strat but you should still claim if that happens to be you.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
No, it isn’t. I am number one. Voting number 1 all the time is a stupid policy, especially d2.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Given how you said you act it’s probably a policy lynch. Its not even one that I disagree with either.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
No, it is random.

Every time I am random voted, I am 1. Coincidence?

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Random voting is pretty solid mid to late game.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I have had more luck in games with random voting than in games where it’s a 'll about blank staring at the clock to tick to 0 .

of cource random isn’t really random . its more about bringing up the quiet talkers .

I’ve won games as mm before where no body has even asked me a question all game

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
That’s not the point. Once you are up there people are going to exe unless you claim no matter how you got up there.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
random voting is not a solid move

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

No. I refuse to, because then they will put another person on

No, they won’t. Tomorrow they will. You will be executed for not giving your class that day. And then scum REALLY won’t think you are Prince once the court is told you are not the Prince.

RopeStringFace:

I will gladly die as a martyr to stop the prince from dying.

That’s a good thought and you’re promoting teamwork and all, but you’re allowing a mislynch to happen just in the OFF CHANCE the evils would’ve killed you tonight instead of the Prince. The Prince is powerful, but he isn’t worth a deliberate mislynch. You’re acting like your sacrifice gives the Prince night immunity or something…it does not. Your sacrifice wastes a day and narrows down the Prince suspect list for evils ANYWAY. Utterly pointless.

RopeStringFace:

if they don’t stop then they were going to lose anyways…

Hanging a person who won’t claim is a solid BD AI move. Just because you don’t agree doesn’t mean your team is the one who drops the ball.

I play the precise opposite of your strategy - I always claim my class when I am on the stand AND I occassionally fakeclaim when I am the Prince if I don’t trust the King. When you are getting everyone’s journals from jail interrogations, fakeclaiming when you’re a Prince is incredibly easy to do.

Whether it is random or not, getting on the stand is serious business. If you refuse to claim, you are allowing scum the chance to call you out as being scum and having a solid alibi of “well, he didn’t claim on the stand. That’s why I executed!”

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
if they don’t stop then they were going to lose anyways…

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
Oh and do they stop ? r do they call you a noob and keep going ?

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
newarkinvaders:

. a 33 percent chance that evil king will exe you is a lot better than a 100 per cent chance the group will exe you

Did you not look at anything I posted? If I am prince I will out, but if I am normal BD then I will not out because I want them to sop randoming, make people think I am prince, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Hmm, it seems no one listened.

I will gladly die as a martyr to stop the prince from dying. If I am cult, I will gladly die so they keep doing it until they find prince.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
you can cry all you want but if you don’t offer a claim you will die . a 33 percent chance that evil king will exe you is a lot better than a 100 per cent chance the group will exe you

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The only time you should ever not claim is if there is another person who is trusted and knows 100% that you are good. EX: You are the prince and have outed to a confirmed phys or a Psychic who also just used a code word with someone to let them know you are confirmed. Or you noble in a cult game that protected a sheriff who knows you when everyone else doesn’t. Then you just have the 3rd person explain that you are confirmed BD 100% and get innoed that way. 90% of the time if you are being random voted it is early game and none of those have happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
If you don’t claim then he will just get you killed and save his decide fate for someone with an actual defense and not even look suspicious.

Read full topic

Quite possibly, as there is a good chance king is evil and will decide my fate

item.description:
I don’t care, I would rather stop the VFC before it gets to the prince. It is mostly to stop people from doing in the first place.

item.description:

item.description:
I will claim on the stand for an actual accusation, but not for a random one. Anyone who doesn’t claim from an actual accusation is evil

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
No they won’t. For every 1 BD that doesn’t claim on the stand there are 3(or more) evils that also might not.

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I don’t care if I die, after I die and flip BD people will stop random voting which overall will be better

item.title: Class Suggestion : Saltshaker/ Salty Convert
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Yes but even Prince would claim on the stand. The only people that ever wouldn’t is the fool/someone pretending to be fool/scum without a fake claim ready.

It doesn’t matter what scum thinks you are if you die. They will just know.

Read full topic
